Table	Create Table
notification_reads	CREATE TABLE `notification_reads` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `notificationId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `userType` enum('admin','customer') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'customer',
  `readAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `notification_reads_notification_idx` (`notificationId`),
  UNIQUE KEY `notification_user_unique_idx` (`notificationId`,`userId`,`userType`),
  KEY `notification_reads_user_idx` (`userId`,`userType`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
